body.name: MSI MPG B550 GAMING PLUS Gaming Motherboard (AMD AM4, DDR4, PCIe 4.0, SATA 6Gb/s, M.2, USB 3.2 Gen 2, HDMI/DP, ATX)
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by UltraParts Renewed.
features: Support for 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen processors and future AMD Ryzen processors with BIOS update
Supports dual channel DDR4 memory up to 128 GB (4400 MHz)
Lightning Fast Game experience: PCIe 4.0, Lightning Gen 4 M.2 with M.2 Shield Frozr, AMD Turbo USB 3.2 GEN 2
MYSTIC LIGHT: RGB LED lighting and extendable pin headers – 16.8 million colors / 29 effects
AUDIO BOOST rewards your ears with studio grade sound quality for immersive gaming experiences
Premium Thermal Solution: Extended heatsink with additional choke thermal pad rated for 7W/mk and PCB with 2oz thickened copper
Pre-installed I/O Shielding for convenience and protection from electrostatic discharge
body.description: Powered by AMD Ryzen AM4 processors, the MSI B550 GAMING PLUS has been forged for performance with Extended Heatsink Design, M.2 Shield Frozr with Frozr Heatsink Design, and Core boost. The Gen 4 M.2 and PCIe connections deliver blistering bandwidth for ultra-fast speed SSDs and PCIe devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MSI is the most trusted name in gaming and eSports. We’ve dedicated countless hours and committed numerous resources to support the world’s most aspiring and best gamers and use their knowledge and expertise in our products in return. MSI integrated all gamer’s aspirational functions in its gaming rigs and pushing the performance beyond limits. MPG B550 GAMING PLUS Advancing Ascension Powered by AMD Ryzen AM4 processors, the MSI B550 GAMING PLUS has been forged for performance with Extended Heatsink Design, M.2 Shield Frozr with Frozr Heatsink Design, and Core boost. The Gen 4 M.2 and PCIe connections deliver blistering bandwidth for ultra-fast speed SSDs and PCIe devices. Support for 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen processors and future AMD Ryzen processors with BIOS update Supports dual channel DDR4 memory up to 128 GB (4400 MHz) Lightning Fast Game experience: PCIe 4.0, Lightning Gen 4 M.2 with M.2 Shield Frozr, AMD Turbo USB 3.2 GEN 2 MYSTIC LIGHT: RGB LED lighting and extendable pin headers – 16.8 million colors / 29 effects AUDIO BOOST rewards your ears with studio grade sound quality for immersive gaming experiences Premium Thermal Solution: Extended heatsink with additional choke thermal pad rated for 7W/mk and PCB with 2oz thickened copper Pre-installed I/O Shielding for convenience and protection from electrostatic discharge

ENHANCED THERMAL SOLUTION Extended heatsink that covers the chokes, 7W/mK rated thermal pads, 2oz thickened copper PCB material, and M.2 Shield Frozr keep temperatures in check and let high-performance parts sustain extreme performance.

LIGHTNING GEN 4 SOLUTION Strike fast with MSI Lightning Gen 4 PCI-E. Attach ultra fast PCI-E 4.0 devices and enjoy up to 64GB/s unidirectional transfer bandwidth. USB TYPE-C READY - Rear IO & Front Case Panel Support Effortlessly plug in devices with reversible USB Type-C. CUSTOMIZE YOUR GAMING RIG Personalize your PC with RGB LED lighting capable of 16.8 million colors with dynamic effects through the Mystic Light APP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for amd 5600 gaming and never had a problem with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Una de las mejores placas que pude comprar, muy bonita en estética... no tiene tanto RGB como algunas pero se ve bien, perfecto funcionamiento desde que la compré en Abril!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars B550 chipset USB header issues.
reviews.reviewText: I'm sure it's a fine motherboard when it works right, but the one I got has the USB issues that seem common to the B550 chipset. This is actually the first I've heard of it, because my old B550 board (an MSI MAG B550M BAZOOKA) was absolutely fine until I messed up flashing the UEFI/BIOS and turned it into a paperweight. Sad. But with this board the internal USB 2.x headers don't work and sometimes will pop up repeated error messages in the Windows 10 notifications. I had to disable the sound of USB connect and USB disconnect because it was constantly going off. But I do not want to be without my PC, so I am dealing with it until I can budget a replacement/upgrade (preferably without the B550 chipset).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Buen producto, muy rápido en llegar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have always had good luck with MSI. This is another example. It had all the features I was looking for and has performed exactly as expected since I purchased it. It doesn't have every feature a motherboard can have but it does have the ones I was looking for went I went to refresh my home desktop with a newer AMD processor. Zero complaints and would wholeheartedly recommend this to anyone looking for a solid motherboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Damaged box but all OK
reviews.reviewText: The box was damaged but the motherboard wasn’t compromised, it works fine and has a really good design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PAIRED WITH RYZEN 9 5900x
reviews.reviewText: Spent almost two days trying to figure out why my display or bios wasn’t loading up. I did a bios update via button (since the mobo can’t recognize Ryzen 9 out of the box). Tried many bios versions and kept getting the Ez debug CPU white light. Then I thought it was my hardware, but that wasn’t the case. Assuming all of your hardware is good, make sure you try a different usb thumb drive with the bios on it before giving up! On my first usb drive, even though the bios update process seemed to work, there’s really no way to tell that it was actually successful. I had to try 2 additional thumb drives until it worked. Also read on forums that this has happened to several people. Also start with 1 ram stick in the second slot from the cpu. Good-luck and I hope no one else goes through this. Hardly any answers online to diagnose this properly.
Placa de excelente calidad y buenas prestaciones, me sirvió muy bien para armar mi pc. Recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great service. Great features. Buying #3. Real review.
reviews.reviewText: PROS for MSI as a CompanyOverall, as you can see from the below, I don't write fake reviews. I write the good ones when earned and negative ones when deserved. In my opinion, MSI has earned 5 stars. They made a lifetime customer out of me by exchanging my 1st motherboard and now that I am building my 3rd system, I took a look at at its main competitor's reviews and decided to stick with MSI. I had previously bought MSI because it was cheaper than the big competitor but now I'm paying equal value.INSTALLATIONApart from plugging in the Power / Reset switches, installation was extremely easy. Performance is excellent but for Ryzen 5 3600 and CPUs in that family, make sure you search the MSI web site for (1) bios update (2) driver installer. Without bios update for some CPUs, you'll be stuck on the bios settings at bootup.FEATURESThe ARGB works using the Dragon Center with my Ryzen 5 3600x, no surprises. No weird shutdowns.Drivers install easily through windows, or are not needed if you use Ubuntu. The temp and voltage monitor through MSI's Dragon Center software is good and non-intrusive.Lots of fan connectors and a lovely and precise side plate.RAM slots are accessible with even larger CPU coolers, though you might have to install CPU cooler after inserting the RAM.GPU slot will make your video card overlap slightly with one of the M2 slots and so your storage. [Update - A few months later, have not noticed any overheating issues.]And finally, the 2 x M.2 slots for storage make this mobo a good catch.CONS(1) The 550 board needlessly exists because you can easily use a 450 with A4, and if you want better performance, you can buy a 570 for not much more.(2) I am not sure if any other motherboards in this price range offer different options for the power/reset key, but it would help to lock down those connectors! They are basically just pins sticking out, with wires attached, and if one detaches, it is painful to put it back.UPDATEBeen shopping around for a second similar build and not finding any motherboards at a better price with all these features--including 2xM2 slots, 2xPci16 slots. Performance remains awesome. You'll pay at least 15-25% more for the same features with other brand names beginning with "A" :)
